text:
We’ll cut greenhouse emissions across the entire U.S. economy by 50% by 2030.

Other candidates talk about 2045 or 2050 when they’re long out of office. I’m focused on delivering progress immediately – because I’m a doer, not a talker. https://mikebloom.bg/2RNdO3l pic.twitter.com/oc0rptaHTD
